Help Contact me (e-mail) OneURL respects your privacy and does not store any personal information. For more information, please refer to our Privacy Policy. 
The use of OneURL to shorten URLs is subject to the terms of use of the respective services provided by third-party providers. Please consult the terms and conditions of each service provider to learn more about their policies and restrictions.

Costs and Rate Limits:
The providers available in the app are free of charge. Some providers therefore have rate limits (e.g. maximum 200 shortened links per hour).
Exceeding the rate limit can lead to temporary or permanent blocking of your IP address with a provider. Please note that this blocking is managed by the service providers themselves.
Normally, these limits should not be reached as a normal user. We recommend to respect the rate limits of the service providers and not to exceed them intentionally to ensure a seamless usage.
Provider info The provider da.gd offers the possibility to use analytics to get insights into the performance of the shortened links. With da.gd, the links must have been accessed at least once within the last 60 days, otherwise an error will be displayed (404). The individual aliases can have a length between 1 and 10 characters and may only consist of the characters a–z, A–Z, 0–9 and the underscore (_). This feature allows users to create personalized and easy-to-remember aliases for their links. Hint before redirecting Before redirecting, v.gd displays a hint that informs the user about the destination URL. The user has the option to click on the displayed URL before the redirection takes place. It is also possible to skip this notice in future. The providers v.gd and is.gd offer the possibility to use analytics to get insights into the performance of the shortened links. The individual aliases can have a length between 5 and 30 characters and may only consist of the characters a–z, A–Z, 0–9 and the underscore (_). This feature allows users to create personalized and easy-to-remember aliases for their links. The individual aliases can have a length between 5 and 100 characters and may only consist of the characters a–z, A–Z, 0–9, -, _. This feature allows users to create personalized and easy-to-remember aliases for their links. The individual aliases can have a length between 1 and 60 characters and may only consist of the characters a–z, A–Z and 0–9. This feature allows users to create personalized and easy-to-remember aliases for their links. The individual aliases may only consist of the characters a–z, A–Z, 0–9 and the underscore (_). This feature allows users to create personalized and easy-to-remember aliases for their links. These providers have been designed to be as data efficient as possible. They are operated from Germany and comply with the applicable privacy regulations in Germany and Europe. Currently disabled The provider ulvis.net is currently disabled because a security check has been added which makes it more difficult to use. The provider owo.vc offers the possibility to use analytics to get insights into the performance of the shortened links. Entertainment In addition to the normal URL shortener, owo.vc also offers other URL shorteners. These are intended for entertainment purposes and should be used respectfully, responsibly and with caution. The URL shortener "owo.vc (zws)" uses Zero-Width Spaces in the generated links. These spaces are invisible, which is why all links appear the same ("owo.vc/"). When copying and pasting in certain apps, these spaces may be removed. In such cases, the standard owo.vc page will open instead of the intended destination URL. Therefore, use this service with caution. The URL shortener "owo.vc (sketchy)" generates suspicious-looking URLs containing keywords like "bank-login", "password", "hidden", "grab" or "account" along with popular website names. The URL shortener "owo.vc (gay)" employs offensive and sexist language and may represent inappropriate or offensive content. Be aware that the generated links may contain sexist terms and could be considered offensive and disrespectful by others. Use this service with respect and responsibility.
Warning Info Don't show again
A URL-Shortener and QR code generator with OneUI-Design. About OneURL Open in Play Store

Beautiful design. Free No ads No subscriptions, no in-app purchases, no costs at all. No annoying ads. Terms of Service The use of OneURL for URL shortening is subject to the terms of use and privacy policy of the respective services provided by third parties.

It is not permitted to use this app contrary to morality or the laws in force. 

You also agree that you will not use this app for any purposes prohibited by United States law, including, without limitation, the development, design, manufacture, or production of missile, chemical or biological weapons. 
However, this restriction will not apply in the event of the occurrence (certified by the United States Centers for Disease Control or successor body) of a widespread viral infection transmitted via bites or contact with bodily fluids that causes human corpses to reanimate and seek to consume living human flesh, blood, brain or nerve tissue and is likely to result in the fall of organized civilization. 

A special consideration, which may include monetary compensation, will be provided to a limited number of users who read this section of the Terms and Services and contact me at writing-an-email-to-this-address-will-cost-you-10-euro@leonard-lemke.com. This offer may be withdrawn at any time without any notice. 

Additional questions will be answered at this-email-is-way-too-long-and-hopefully-you-cannot-copy-paste@leonard-lemke.com. By continuing, you agree to the %1$s. Continue
